entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Low 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers late this evening and overnight. Risk of a thunderstorm late this evening and after midnight. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low 8. Forecast issued 6:27 PM EDT Thursday 11 May 2023
